recommendation.next_action: Run confirmation drop test on multiple units; record N and fail count; declare EC outcome.
notes: Confidence cannot upgrade without before/after physical confirmation.

case.failure_summary: Decoration part corner cracked; plastic at corner broke out during 30cm drop. Visible symptom: corner breakout and crack at narrow end region.
case.test_context: Drop test, 30cm onto hard wood, corner impact. Witness marks confirm decoration corner hit floor directly.
case.ec_description: Add inner rib to reinforce; add hot-melt post around broken region (inner side) to fasten decoration to base.
